Warwick.Greene\u2013Durfee House: The Greene–Durfee House (also Greene–Durffee) is a historic house at 1272 West Shore Road in Warwick, Rhode Island. The house, a 2-1/2 story wood frame structure with a large central chimney, stands set well back from the west side of the road, opposite Church Avenue and a small cemetery. It is set behind a small wood-frame commercial building and is partially screened from view by bushes.
